title: Curried parsnip soup
ingredients: ['300g parsnips', '2 medium onions', '2 to 3 cloves garlic', '50g butter', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '1 chopped fresh red chilli', '1.2L chicken or vegetable stock', '150g potatoes', '1 tablespoon creamed or dessicated coconut', 'double cream', 'smoked paprika']
